translation.en: Budapest. Budapest. -The next stop's Budapest. -[all gasp]
translation.zh: 布达佩斯 下一站 布达佩斯

translation.en: Budapest is the next stop. Budapest.
translation.zh: 下一站是布达佩斯 布达佩斯

translation.en: -Tickets, ladies. -[in falsetto] Oop, here you go.
translation.zh: 女士们 火车票 -这里 -这是我的

translation.en: -[in falsetto] Here's mine. -[in falsetto] And mine.
translation.zh: -这里 -这是我的 -还有我的 -我的也是

translation.en: -[in falsetto] Mine, too! -[in falsetto] Here you go!
translation.zh: -还有我的 -我的也是 这里

translation.en: Eh, thank you, young man.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 年轻人

translation.en: [in normal voice] Man, I hate wearing disguises.
translation.zh: 我讨厌伪装

translation.en: These heels are killing me!
translation.zh: 这些高跟鞋真要命！

translation.en: Okay, take it down a notch. We don't want to alarm the humans.
translation.zh: 好了 小声点 我们不要惊动到人类

translation.en: -[boy whimpering] -Psst. Drac.
translation.zh: 德古拉

translation.en: [German accent] I'm about to und freak out!
translation.zh: 我要喊出来了！

translation.en: You're a nice kitty.
translation.zh: 你是一只好猫咪

translation.en: I'm und kitty-cat. Meow. Meow!
translation.zh: 我是一只小猫咪 喵喵

translation.en: Oh, no, not this clown again.
translation.zh: 糟了 又是那小丑

translation.en: Good evening, travelers. I am Professor Abraham Van Helsing.
translation.zh: 乘客们 晚上好！ 我是亚伯拉罕范海辛博士

translation.en: Yes. One of the Van Helsings.
translation.zh: 是的！其中一个范海辛！

translation.en: For centuries, my family has protected humanity
translation.zh: 几个世纪以来 我的家族保护人类

translation.en: from the evils of monsters.
translation.zh: 免于妖怪的侵害

translation.en: So you can believe me when I tell you,
translation.zh: 所以你们可以相信我当我告诉你们

translation.en: there are monsters hiding amongst you!
translation.zh: 妖怪躲在你们当中！

translation.en: But fear not,
translation.zh: 但是别怕因为我是专业人士

translation.en: for I am a professional, and I know how to flush out
translation.zh: 但是别怕因为我是专业人士 我懂得如何逼这些妖怪

translation.en: these beasts and bring them into the light!
translation.zh: 我懂得如何逼这些妖怪 令他们曝光！

translation.en: -Fire bad! -[yowling]
translation.zh: 火危险！

translation.en: -[screaming] -[chicken clucking]
translation.zh: 穿帮了！

translation.en: -Sorry, guys. -[all screaming]
translation.zh: 对不起 大伙们

translation.en: Finally! First I kill Dracula,
translation.zh: 终于！首先我要杀了德古拉

translation.en: and then the rest of the monsters!
translation.zh: 和其余的妖怪！

translation.en: Why do you keep doing this?
translation.zh: 为何你不断这样做？

translation.en: Your dad, your grandfather, your great-great-granny...
translation.zh: 你爸爸、爷爷、曾曾祖父

translation.en: I defeated them all.
translation.zh: 都被我打败了！

translation.en: When will you Van Helsings ever learn to let go of the hate?
translation.zh: 范海辛家族什么时候 才学会放下仇恨？

translation.en: Never! Because you, monster, are a...
translation.zh: 永不 因为像你这样的妖怪是一个…

translation.en: What? A mouse?
translation.zh: 什么？一只老鼠？

translation.en: You can't run from me, Prince of Darkness!
translation.zh: 你逃不脱我 黑暗王子！

translation.en: I will hunt you for all eternity! [screams]
translation.zh: 我会一直追捕你！

translation.en: I swear I will never rest until I destroy you... [groans]
translation.zh: 我发誓我绝不言休 直到我杀了你

translation.en: And-- [yelps]
translation.zh: 还有

translation.en: Every-- [groans]
translation.zh: 所有

translation.en: Other--
translation.zh: 其他的

translation.en: Monster--
translation.zh: 妖怪

translation.en: If it's the last thing-- [groans]
translation.zh: 如果这是我

translation.en: I-- [grunts]
translation.zh: 最后一件

translation.en: Ever-- [groans]
translation.zh: 要做的

translation.en: Do!
translation.zh: 事！

translation.en: Boy, that guy is annoying.
translation.zh: 天啊 那家伙真讨厌

translation.en: Maybe one day there will be a place where monsters can go to get away from it all,
translation.zh: 也许有一天出现一个地方 让妖怪们远离这一切

translation.en: take a vacation.
translation.zh: 去放一个假

translation.en: Who knows, maybe even get married.
translation.zh: 谁知道？甚至结婚

translation.en: Wouldn't that be something?
translation.zh: 那不是很特别吗？

translation.en: [shushing] It's okay. Oh, when is this thing starting?
translation.zh: 没事 这东西什么时候开始？

translation.en: Aw, you made them cry, Wayne.
translation.zh: 你令他们哭了 维恩

translation.en: All except this little one. Coochie-coochie...
translation.zh: 除了这个小的

translation.en: [Wayne] That's Sunny. She doesn't cry.
translation.zh: 那是珊妮 她不哭

translation.en: -[yelping in pain] -She bites.
translation.zh: 她咬人

translation.en: -This is a very special moment, Carl. -[whimpering]
translation.zh: 这是很特别的一刻 卡尔

translation.en: Any second, your beautiful bride is going to walk right down the aisle.
translation.zh: 你美丽的新娘随时会从那走道进来

translation.en: Oh, no, Drac, she's not coming.
translation.zh: 糟了 德古拉！她不来了！

translation.en: -[air deflating] -Oh, don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: Mavis is with her. I'm sure everything is under control.
translation.zh: 梅维丝和她一起 我肯定一切在控制内

translation.en: Mavey, is everything under control?
translation.zh: 梅维 一切在控制中吗？

translation.en: Um, yep, just a slight case of pre-wedding jitters.
translation.zh: 是的 只是一些婚前恐惧

translation.en: -[hissing] -[whimpering]
translation.zh: 喷发剂

translation.en: Yep, everything is fine here.
translation.zh: 是的 这里一切很好

translation.en: Please try to relax, Lucy. I've taken care of everything.
translation.zh: 请尝试放松 露西 我已经处理了一切

translation.en: The wedding is going to be perfect.
translation.zh: 这婚礼将会很完美

translation.en: It's not that. Just, how do I know I'm doing the right thing?
translation.zh: 不是这回事 我怎么知道我做对了？

translation.en: -[crying] -I know just how you feel.
translation.zh: 我很理解你的感受

translation.en: The day I married Johnny was the best day of my life,
translation.zh: 我嫁给约翰尼那天 是人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: but I was so nervous.
translation.zh: 但是我很紧张

translation.en: Not as nervous as I was.
translation.zh: 没你那么紧张

translation.en: And you should have seen my dad. He was a mess.
translation.zh: 你应该看我爸的婚礼 他一塌糊涂

translation.en: I wouldn't get out of my coffin that night.
translation.zh: 那晚我不肯离开我的棺材

translation.en: But he knew it was meant to be.
translation.zh: 但是他知道那是注定的

translation.en: It doesn't matter where you come from or how different you are.
translation.zh: 你从哪里来或有何分别不重要

translation.en: A Zing only happens once in your life, and you have to cherish it.
translation.zh: 那感觉一生人只出现一次 你必须珍惜它

translation.en: You're right! Thank you!
translation.zh: 你说得对！谢谢！

translation.en: [grunting] Okay. All right. Okay. Oh. Uh... Okay. [forced chuckle]
translation.zh: 好了 好

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: -[distant thudding, rumbling] -Do you hear that?
translation.zh: 你听到吗？

translation.en: -Yes. I thought we locked him in his room. -We did!
translation.zh: -是 我以为我们把他关在房里了 -已经关起来了！

translation.en: -[panting] -Hi, Mom. Hi, Papa.
translation.zh: 嗨 妈！嗨 爸爸！

translation.en: [both] Dennis!
translation.zh: 丹尼斯！

translation.en: Tinkles was crying, so we let him out.
translation.zh: 丁格斯哭了 所以我们把它放出来

translation.en: Tinkles, sit!
translation.zh: 丁格斯！坐下！

translation.en: -[whining] -Ah. Whose idea was it to let Dennis have a puppy?
translation.zh: 是谁让丹尼斯养小狗？

translation.en: -Um, yours? -[chuckles sheepishly]
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: [stammers] Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -Poor Tinkles. -[Mavis] Dennis.
translation.zh: 可怜的丁格斯 丹尼斯

translation.en: Look, honey, I know you love Tinkles, but we're not allowed to bring our dogs--
translation.zh: 听好 亲爱的 我知道你爱丁格斯 但我们不允许带狗

translation.en: -[gasps] -Uh... I mean, our pets everywhere. Okay?
translation.zh: 我是说我们的宠物到处去 好吗？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: DJ Jazzy Johnny in the house.
translation.zh: 爵希唱片骑士在这里

translation.en: It's time to welcome the happy couple, Mr. and Mrs. Prickles!
translation.zh: 是时候欢迎幸福的夫妻：尖刺夫妇！

translation.en: [Jonathan] The bride and groom invite everyone to join them on the dance floor.
translation.zh: 新郎和新娘邀请大家加入舞池

translation.en: [female monster] Care to dance?
translation.zh: 要跳舞吗？

translation.en: -[Griffin] Is that her? -Ooh! Watch out now.
translation.zh: 是她吗？ 小心！她在适当的地方都有缝线

translation.en: She got stitches in all the right places.
translation.zh: 小心！她在适当的地方都有缝线

translation.en: Okay, there's no way that is related to you, Frank.
translation.zh: 她绝对和你没关系 弗兰克

translation.en: Well, she's my right arm's cousin.
translation.zh: 不 她是我右手的表妹

translation.en: -Oh! -[Griffin] Ah! I see it now.
translation.zh: 现在我明白了

translation.en: -Frank wanted me to meet you. -[bones crunching]
translation.zh: 弗兰克要我见你

translation.en: We're arm cousins, twice removed.
translation.zh: 我们是手臂表兄妹 移植了两次

translation.en: [Dracula] Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: I'd recognize that bicep anywhere.
translation.zh: 我见过那手臂

translation.en: He thought, since we're both single,
translation.zh: 他认为既然我们都是单身 我们可能有感觉

translation.en: we might hit it off, maybe go on a date?
translation.zh: 他认为既然我们都是单身 我们可能有感觉 也许可以去约会

translation.en: [Dracula] "Date"? Oh! Well, eh, it's just that, eh...
translation.zh: “约会”？只是…

translation.en: -[rock music begins] -Whoa! The DJ booth is a sacred space!
translation.zh: 哇！唱片骑士亭是神圣的地方！

translation.en: [giggles] I love this song!
translation.zh: 我喜欢这首歌！

translation.en: Don't you? Dracula?
translation.zh: 你喜欢吗？德古拉？

translation.en: Oh, where'd he go? Dracula? Dracula?
translation.zh: 他去哪里了？ 德古拉？

translation.en: -[music stops] -What's the matter, Drac, you didn't like her?
translation.zh: 什么问题 德古拉？你不喜欢她？

translation.en: [Griffin] No offense, but you can't be too picky. You haven't had a date in 100 years.
translation.zh: 不是冒犯 你不能太挑剔 你没约会一百年了

translation.en: Look, guys, I appreciate your concern, but it's not up to me.
translation.zh: 听好 大伙们 我感激你们的关心 但不是由我来决定

translation.en: You only Zing once, and I did.
translation.zh: 那种感觉只有一次 而我的出现过了

translation.en: Times have changed, buddy.
translation.zh: 时代改变了 朋友

translation.en: You can even find someone to Zing with on your phone now.
translation.zh: 现在你甚至可以从电话找感情

translation.en: [laughing] What? Really?
translation.zh: 什么？真的吗？

translation.en: Oh. Oh, no, no, no. I'm far too busy.
translation.zh: 不 我太忙了

translation.en: I have Mavis and Dennis and the hotel, and bleh, bleh-bleh.
translation.zh: 我有梅维丝和丹尼斯和酒店 巴拉巴拉巴拉

translation.en: Um, did you guys hear that? He actually said, "Bleh, bleh-bleh."
translation.zh: 你们听到了吗？ 他真的说“巴拉巴拉巴拉”

translation.en: I don't say, "Bleh, bleh-bleh"!
translation.zh: 我没说“巴拉巴拉巴拉”！

translation.en: Eh, uh, I'm looking for a Zing.
translation.zh: 我要找一段感情

translation.en: -Okay. Changing phone ring. -[ringtone plays]
translation.zh: 好 更换电话铃声

translation.en: No, no. I'm looking for a date.
translation.zh: 不 我要找一个约会对象

translation.en: No, no, no, no. I want to meet someone.
translation.zh: 不 我要认识人

translation.en: Are you kidding me right now?
translation.zh: 现在你跟我开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Don't you get it? I want to go on a date!
translation.zh: 你不明白吗？我要去约会！

translation.en: I'm lonely.
translation.zh: 我很寂寞

translation.en: -You want baloney. -[groans]
translation.zh: 你要香肠

translation.en: What? Look at that hair. Come on.
translation.zh: 不 看那里 （星儿）

translation.en: Ah. Too many eyes.
translation.zh: 太多眼睛

translation.en: Too few eyes.
translation.zh: 太少眼睛

translation.en: -Not into tentacles. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.zh: 不喜欢触脚

translation.en: "Match found"?
translation.zh: “找到对象”？

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: First things first.
translation.zh: 首要条件

translation.en: I'm not into games. You'd better have a job, and my cats have to like you.
translation.zh: 我不是玩玩的 你最好有一份工作！ 我的猫必须喜欢你！

translation.en: [Dracula] Oh, no, no. Oh, whoa, no.
translation.zh: 不！等一等 不

translation.en: -Dad? -Oh! Mavis! Oh. Uh, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: -爸？ -梅维丝？ 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: I was just checking on the honeymoon suite, and I heard something.
translation.zh: 我在检查蜜月套房然后我听到声音

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, my little bedbug. I was just cleaning the attic.
translation.zh: 对不起 亲爱的 我在清理阁楼

translation.en: It's so dirty, ah, yes...
translation.zh: 太脏了

translation.en: -[witch over phone] Who is that? -Are you on the phone?
translation.zh: -那是谁？ -你在讲电话吗？

translation.en: What, this? I was just trying to find a maid
translation.zh: 什么？这个？我只是 想要找一个女仆帮我清理这里！

translation.en: -to help me with the mess. -[witch] A maid?
translation.zh: 想要找一个女仆帮我清理这里！ 一个女仆？你以为你是…

translation.en: -Who do you think-- -Thank you, I'll check your references and get back to you. Goodbye!
translation.zh: 谢谢 我会看你的资料然后给你回电 再见！

translation.en: -Dad. -[gibbers] Stop trying to hide it from me.
translation.zh: 爸 别再隐瞒我了

translation.en: Hide? Who? I mean, what? Me?
translation.zh: 隐瞒谁？我是说什么？我？

translation.en: Yes. And I know what it is.
translation.zh: 是的 我还知道是什么

translation.en: Uh... Really? You're stressed out from working too hard.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -你的工作压力太大了

translation.en: Oh! Okay, yes. You got me. [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 好 是的 你猜对了

translation.en: It's a big hotel, you know? Can't get to everything.
translation.zh: 嘿 这是大酒店 你知道吗？ 不能做完所有事情

translation.en: But what about you? You're pretty busy yourself.
translation.zh: 你呢？你自己也很忙

translation.en: I know. It seems like now that we're working together more,
translation.zh: 我知道 看来我们合作增多

translation.en: we're seeing each other less.
translation.zh: 见面却少了

translation.en: Ah. Yeah. You're absolutely right.
translation.zh: 是的 你说得很对

translation.en: I am working too much, you're working too much.
translation.zh: 我工作太多 你工作太多

translation.en: We should really take a break, starting right now.
translation.zh: 我们应该休息一下 从现在开始

translation.en: Night-night!
translation.zh: 晚安！

translation.en: -[sighs in relief] -[witch] I'm still here!
translation.zh: 我还在线上

translation.en: Oh! Hey, honey. You ready for [yawns] date night?
translation.zh: 嘿 亲爱的 你准备好约会之夜了吗？

translation.en: Aw. That's okay, sweetheart. You rest.
translation.zh: 没关系 宝贝 你 休息吧

translation.en: You know, Dad's right. We need a break.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 爸说得对 我们需要休息

translation.en: We need to all be together again, like a family. Like we used to.
translation.zh: 我们大家必须聚在一起 像一家人 像以前那样

translation.en: [man on TV] Are you overworked and stressed out?
translation.zh: 你工作太多和压力太大吗？

translation.en: -[grunts] -Do you need some family time?
translation.zh: 你需要一些家庭时间吗？

translation.en: Are you a monster?
translation.zh: 你是妖怪吗？

translation.en: Then you need a vacation, a monster vacation.
translation.zh: 那么你需要一个假期 一个妖怪假期

translation.en: [stewardess] Welcome aboard Gremlin Air.
translation.zh: 欢迎乘搭 （小魔怪航空）

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, please direct your attention to the front of the cabin.
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 请注意机舱前方

translation.en: For your safety, please unbuckle your seat belts.
translation.zh: 为了您的安全 请解开安全带

translation.en: In the likely event we experience a sudden drop in cabin pressure,
translation.zh: 在有可能的情况下 机舱压力突然下降的话

translation.en: oxygen will be provided.
translation.zh: 氧气将被提供

translation.en: -Can I stow that for you, sir? -All right. Thanks.
translation.zh: -先生 我可以帮你收好行李吗？ -好 谢谢！

translation.en: Beverages. Snacks. Beverages.
translation.zh: 饮料！零食！饮料！

translation.en: Beverages. Beverages. Snacks. Snacks. Snacks. Beverages.
translation.zh: 饮料…零食…

translation.en: -Coffee? -That would be lovely.
translation.zh: -要咖啡吗？ -好

translation.en: Mavis, please, you're torturing me. You know I hate surprises.
translation.zh: 梅维丝 拜托 你在折磨我 你知道我讨厌惊喜

translation.en: [chuckles] This is a fun surprise.
translation.zh: 这是一个开心的惊喜

translation.en: There are no fun surprises.
translation.zh: 没有所谓的开心惊喜

translation.en: Just tell me where we're going. Why are we on a plane?
translation.zh: 快说我们要去哪里 为何我们在飞机上？

translation.en: We can fly, you know.
translation.zh: 我们能飞 你知道的

translation.en: Back in my day, people took trains. Now, that's classy.
translation.zh: 在我那年代 人们搭火车 那才有品位

translation.en: Sure, Dad. Forty hours in a closet-sized room
translation.zh: 当然 爸 四十小时在一个衣橱大小的房里

translation.en: with you and Uncle Bernie and his smelly cigars,
translation.zh: 和你和伯尼叔叔和他的臭雪茄

translation.en: arguing who was more attractive, Cleopatra or Nefertiti.
translation.zh: 争论谁更美丽 克莉奥帕特拉或奈费尔提蒂

translation.en: Oh, Nefertiti.
translation.zh: 奈费尔提蒂

translation.en: -Okay, Dad, thank you. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 好 爸！谢谢

translation.en: Mavis, this is such an amazing surprise!
translation.zh: 梅维丝 这是一个很大的惊喜

translation.en: I can't wait to spend time with the people I love most.
translation.zh: 我很心急跟我心爱的人一起

translation.en: But I beg of you, tell me where we're going!
translation.zh: 但是我求你 告诉我 我们要去哪里！

translation.en: Nope. I've taken care of everything, so you don't need to worry.
translation.zh: 不 我已经处理好一切了 所以你不必担心

translation.en: You've been so stressed out lately.
translation.zh: 你最近压力很大

translation.en: It's time for you to relax.
translation.zh: 是时候 让你放松

translation.en: -[grunts] -Now, isn't that better? Oh, yes.
translation.zh: -现在是不是好多了？ -是的

translation.en: So relaxed.
translation.zh: 真放松！

translation.en: I'm gonna go check on you-know-who.
translation.zh: 我要去看看你知道是谁

translation.en: I'll be right back. -I have to go to the bathroom. -[gremlin cackles]
translation.zh: 我很快回来 我必须上厕所

translation.en: Hey, did you see that?
translation.zh: 嘿 你看到吗？

translation.en: Dennis went to the bathroom!
translation.zh: 丹尼斯上厕所了！

translation.en: Uh... Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Psst. Hey, where are you?
translation.zh: 嘿！你在哪里？

translation.en: There you are, Tinkles.
translation.zh: 你在这里 丁格斯

translation.en: Don't worry, we'd never leave you home alone.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们绝不会让你一个人在家

translation.en: [pilot over PA] Okay, folks, you're free to move about the cabin, as we have started our descent.
translation.zh: 好了 各位 你们可以自由活动 因为我们开始下降了

translation.en: So, any big plans for the weekend there, Bill?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, right, but, uh, maybe you'll find

translation.en: but not anymore!

translation.en: Now it's time to celebrate!

我

translation.en: Fish.

translation.en: Whatever we want.

translation.en: Endlessly, I searched for the lost city.

translation.en: Oh, it was so sad, Ericka.

translation.en: followed by a kidney or two.

translation.en: But I wouldn't let that stop me.

translation.en: I replaced my failing organs with technology!

translation.en: Oh, forget about all this!

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: We have to stick to the plan.
translation.zh: 我们必须按照计划

translation.en: Lure the monsters to Atlantis, retrieve the instrument of destruction,
translation.zh: 引妖怪们到阿特兰蒂斯 寻获毁灭工具

translation.en: trap them there, and then wipe them out.
translation.zh: 把它们困在那里并消灭它们

translation.en: It's simple, Ericka!

translation.en: Now, promise me you won't try and kill Dracula.

translation.en: Ugh, fine!

translation.en: -I promise. -Promise what?

translation.en: [sighs] I promise I won't try and kill Dracula. Okay?

translation.en: Don't worry, Great-Grandfather, I won't try and kill him...

translation.en: I will kill him.

translation.en: ♪ Uh, look out ♪
translation.zh: （火焰枪 只限紧急情况下使用）

translation.en: Ugh! Darn it!

translation.en: Work it, Dracula.

translation.en: You know it.

translation.en: Oh! Lookin' good, Drac! Feeling good, Frank.
translation.zh: -看来不错 德古拉！ -感觉很好 弗兰克！

translation.en: Look at you, so fancy!
translation.zh: 看你 那么帅

translation.en: What? This? Please. Ooh! Dressed to impress, huh?
translation.zh: -什么？这个？拜托 -用衣着来吸引人吗？

translation.en: "Impress"? Oh. Who do I need to impress?
translation.zh: “吸引”？我要“吸引”谁？

translation.en: Hey, isn't that Captain Ericka?
translation.zh: 不是艾丽卡船长吗？

translation.en: Oh, no! [blubbers]

translation.en: [Griffin] Oops, no, not her.
translation.zh: 糟了 不是她

translation.en: -Ooh, that's good! -[Dracula chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 那很好

translation.en: Very amusing.

translation.en: Sorry, Drac. You know, it's just we've never seen you like this.

translation.en: I know. I know. It doesn't make any sense.
translation.zh: 我知道 这不合理

translation.en: You can't Zing twice, it's impossible!

translation.en: But I did! So now what?
translation.zh: 但是我是！现在怎么办？

translation.en: [gasps] And what about Mavis?
translation.zh: 那梅维丝 怎么办呢？

translation.en: She wants you to be happy, right?
translation.zh: 她要你开心 对吗？

translation.en: I'm sure she'll go with the flow.
translation.zh: 我肯定她一定同意的

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 噢 不！

translation.en: Mavis needs me. She depends on me.
translation.zh: 梅维丝需要我 她依靠我

translation.en: I need to be home with my family.
translation.zh: 我必须回家和家人一起

translation.en: Hey, Murray here may be from Egypt,
translation.zh: 嘿 穆雷可能来自埃及

translation.en: but you're the one in "da Nile."
translation.zh: 但是只有你否认

translation.en: You guys get that?

translation.en: -[thuds] -Ow! You hit me right in the...

translation.en: Mavis!

translation.en: Don't say a word, or I'll haunt your dreams.

translation.en: Having fun?

translation.en: Oh, I'm having even more fun now that you're here.

translation.en: Now, are you ready for me to destroy you in monster ball?

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! Monster ball! -[giggles]

translation.en: Come on, Papa Drac!

translation.en: [chuckles] Bring it on! For I am king of family fun!

translation.en: Ha-ha! All right! Who is ready to get pummeled?
translation.zh: 好了 谁准备好被痛宰？

translation.en: I got to warn you,
translation.zh: 我必须警告你

translation.en: I played second-team coed intramural volleyball at Santa Cruz.
translation.zh: 我在圣克鲁斯打男女第二队排球联赛

translation.en: -[Mavis chuckles] -Sure, pal. Whatever you say.
translation.zh: 好的 朋友 随便你说什么

translation.en: Everybody, just please watch the hair. Watch the hair!
translation.zh: 各位 拜托 小心我的头发 小心头发！

translation.en: Oh-ho-ho! Let's go! Let's do this!
translation.zh: 来吧！我们开始！

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, this is gonna be so much fun.
translation.zh: 我的天！这将很好玩

translation.en: [Murray] Ha-ha! Get ready.
translation.zh: 我的天！这将很好玩 准备 痛苦来了！

translation.en: Here comes the pain!
translation.zh: 准备 痛苦来了！

translation.en: -Spike! -Not the hair! Not the hair!
translation.zh: 不要打到头发！不要打到头发！

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -[all cheering] -All right!
translation.zh: 很好！

translation.en: [Fish Man over PA] Captain Ericka, you are needed on deck.
translation.zh: 艾丽卡船长 驾驶舱需要你

translation.en: Next stop... Buh-bye, Dracula.
translation.zh: 下一站：再见了 德古拉

translation.en: Ha-ha! All right, baby!
translation.zh: 很好 宝贝！

translation.en: Oh, baby, I got this.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我来接

translation.en: Hey there, monsters.
translation.zh: 嗨 妖怪们

translation.en: Yeah! What'd I say!
translation.zh: 好！我说过什么？

translation.en: [Ericka] We're arriving at our first destination.
translation.zh: 我们即将抵达我们的第一站

translation.en: The underwater volcano!
translation.zh: 水底火山！

translation.en: Everyone, grab your scuba gear and get ready to explore
translation.zh: 大家拿你们的潜水用具 准备探索奇妙的海底世界

translation.en: the wonders of the sea.
translation.zh: 准备探索奇妙的海底世界

translation.en: Especially you, Count Dracula.
translation.zh: 尤其是你 德古拉公爵

translation.en: You see that, pal? She likes you. Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -你看到吗 朋友？她喜欢你！ -不

translation.en: That sounds like a Zing in full effect. Oh, no, no, no.
translation.zh: -那听起来动了真情 -不

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes, yes.
translation.zh: 是是是！

translation.en: I'm just here to have family fun.
translation.zh: 我只是为了家庭欢乐而来

translation.en: Family, family, fun, fun.
translation.zh: 家庭欢乐！

translation.en: Hmm, let's see. What about here?
translation.zh: 嗯 让我看看 这里呢？

translation.en: Right this way, everyone.
translation.zh: 各位 这边

translation.en: Welcome to one of the true wonders of the underwater kingdom.
translation.zh: 欢迎光临水下其中一个奇观

translation.en: I give you Volcano del Fuego.
translation.zh: 我介绍你们：德福戈火山

translation.en: Or, as the local sea life call it...
translation.zh: 或当地的海洋生物称它为

translation.en: Aw, what a cute family.
translation.zh: 好可爱的家庭

translation.en: What? No, it's not. Argh! Dracula bad! Dracula bad!
translation.zh: 什么？不是 德古拉是坏蛋

translation.en: [Griffin] Frank, we just ate. I can't believe you're hungry already.
translation.zh: 弗兰克 我们刚吃了 我不能相信你又饿了

translation.en: I'm sorry. You know what it is?
translation.zh: 对不起 你知道什么原因吗？

translation.en: It's all... Just all that seafood just swimming around,
translation.zh: 因为海鲜在身边游泳

translation.en: and when I "see food..."
translation.zh: 当我看到食物…

translation.en: Oh, man! I'm gone.
translation.zh: 天啊！我要走了

translation.en: Oh! Dracula, Dracula, Dracula!
translation.zh: 德古拉！

translation.en: Dracula, Dracula!
translation.zh: 德古拉！

translation.en: I get so close, but it's almost like he's teasing me.
translation.zh: 我差那一点但是好像他在戏弄我

translation.en: I just, I can't stand it anymore. I have to get him!
translation.zh: 我不能忍受了 我必须得到他

translation.en: Boy, that underwater volcano looked hot.
translation.zh: 天啊 那水底火山真热！

translation.en: Oh, uh... Hi, Bob.
translation.zh: 嗨 鲍勃

translation.en: Right. We promised you we'd play, uh, ping-pong now.
translation.zh: 对 我们答应过你我们现在打乒乓球

translation.en: Um, Dennis? Who is this?
translation.zh: 丹尼斯？这是谁？

translation.en: Uh, it's our friend, Bob.
translation.zh: -我们的朋友鲍勃 -说“嗨” 鲍勃

translation.en: -Say hi, Bob. -"Hi, Bob."
translation.zh: -我们的朋友鲍勃 -说“嗨” 鲍勃 嗨 鲍勃

translation.en: Okay! Time to go play ping-pong.
translation.zh: 好！是时候去打乒乓球啦

translation.en: -[Frankenstein] Drac! -[Griffin] Drac!
translation.zh: -德古拉！ -德古拉…

translation.en: -Drac! -Drac!
translation.zh: -德古拉！ -德古拉… 德古拉…

translation.en: -Drac! -Drac!
translation.zh: 德古拉…

translation.en: Hey, boys, where's the fire?
translation.zh: 大伙们 火在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, uh, well, Griffin here, he...
translation.zh: -格里芬 这里… -他有事要告诉你

translation.en: -He has something to tell you. -Me? Uh...
translation.zh: -格里芬 这里… -他有事要告诉你 我？嗯…

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, I got this bite on my hand, and since, you know,
translation.zh: 我的手被咬到自从…

translation.en: you're a biting expert, I thought you could take a look.
translation.zh: 你是咬东西专家 我想…

translation.en: -Yeah. Come on over here. -The light is better.
translation.zh: -过来这里 -这里灯光比较好

translation.en: Okay...
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay, what is going on? You guys are acting
translation.zh: 发生什么事？你们比平时怪很多…

translation.en: weirder than normal, and your normal is pretty weird.
translation.zh: 发生什么事？你们比平时怪很多… 而你们的平时也蛮怪

translation.en: You are not gonna believe what we heard, but--
translation.zh: 你绝不会相信我们所听到的…

translation.en: ♪ Ericka loves the Drac♪
translation.zh: 艾丽卡爱德古拉

translation.en: ♪ She can't get enough Of that Drac, Drac ♪
translation.zh: 她非常喜欢德古拉

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yeah ♪ ♪ Drac is back ♪
translation.zh: 好 德古拉回来了

translation.en: ♪ He's got the Zing ♪ ♪The Zinga-Zing Zing Zing ♪
translation.zh: 他动了真情

translation.en: Shh. I told you I don't want to upset Mavis.
translation.zh: 我说过我不想令梅维丝生气！

translation.en: -But what are you talking about? -[crowd gasps]
translation.zh: 但是你在说什么？

translation.en: Okay, well, see, Frank got hungry, so no surprise there...
translation.zh: 听好 弗兰克饿了 那没什么奇怪

translation.en: But we swam back to the ship, and we found Ericka raving about you.
translation.zh: 但是我们游回船上 发现艾丽卡在自言自语说你

translation.en: She can't live without you, buddy! It's serious!
translation.zh: 她不能没了你 朋友 真的！

translation.en: ♪ You can't deny The Zing, baby ♪
translation.zh: 你不能拒绝真感情 宝贝

translation.en: So, Drac, this is great. Are you gonna make a move on the captain, or what?
translation.zh: 德古拉 这太棒了 你是否要对船长做出进一步？

translation.en: Uh, yes.
translation.zh: 是 可能吧？

translation.en: -Maybe? No. -Ugh.
translation.zh: 是 可能吧？ 不

translation.en: I... It's been a while. I don't even know where to start.
translation.zh: 已经过了很久 我甚至不晓得从何开始

translation.en: It's easy, Drac. Just make some small talk.
translation.zh: -很容易 德古拉 开始随便聊聊 -记得要微笑

translation.en: -Remember to smile. -Look into her eyes.
translation.zh: -很容易 德古拉 开始随便聊聊 -记得要微笑 -看着她的眼睛 -保持随意

translation.en: -Keep it casual. -Say something funny.
translation.zh: -看着她的眼睛 -保持随意 -说有趣的东西 -问她的身体部位从哪里来

translation.en: Ask her where her parts are from.
translation.zh: -说有趣的东西 -问她的身体部位从哪里来

translation.en: Oh, and say that her wrappings look nice.
translation.zh: -说她的包扎很漂亮 -“你喜欢棺材吗？”

translation.en: -"Do you like coffins?" -Compliment her.
translation.zh: -说她的包扎很漂亮 -“你喜欢棺材吗？” -赞美她 “你的脖子很美味！” -她来了

translation.en: -"Your neck looks delicious." -[Griffin] Here she comes.
translation.zh: -赞美她 “你的脖子很美味！” -她来了

translation.en: Okay, Drac, hit it.
translation.zh: 好 德古拉 去吧！

translation.en: Your delicious neck wrappings are in a nice coffin.
translation.zh: 你美味的脖子 包扎在一个美丽的棺材里

translation.en: Would you like to see my parts?
translation.zh: 你想看我的身体部位吗？

translation.en: Yes, I'd love to go out with you.
translation.zh: 是 我很乐意和你出去

translation.en: -Ay! What? -[all] What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -什么？

translation.en: Cantina. Midnight. Don't be late.
translation.zh: 小酒吧 午夜 别迟到

translation.en: -That was a close one. -[panting]
translation.zh: 真危险

translation.en: -Wait! Stop it, Tinkles, stop! -Wait, Tinkles. Come back.
translation.zh: -等一等！丁格斯 回来！ -停 丁格斯！停！

translation.en: -[Dennis] Tinkles, stop! -[Winnie] Wait!
translation.zh: -丁格斯 停！ -等一等！

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -Tinkles, stop! -[gasping] I've been found!
translation.zh: 丁格斯 停！ 我被发现了！

translation.en: You'll never get me, monster!
translation.zh: 你们捉不到我的 妖怪！

translation.en: [Dennis] Shh! Tinkles, stop. Shh! Shh!
translation.zh: 丁格斯 停

translation.en: [Fish Man over PA] Everybody, we are pulling up to our next stop, the Deserted Island.
translation.zh: 大家好 我们即将抵达下一站 一个荒岛

translation.en: It's time to get lost on the beach,
translation.zh: 是时候迷失在沙滩上

translation.en: and we hope you'll find yourself some fun and relaxation.
translation.zh: 我们希望你能找到一些欢乐和放松

translation.en: [Jonathan] Whoo-hoo! Beach time!
translation.zh: 沙滩时间！

translation.en: Johnny, you go set everything up.
translation.zh: 约翰尼 你去准备一切

translation.en: And, Dad, you go get in line for the snow cones.
translation.zh: 爸 你去排队拿甜筒冰淇淋

translation.en: You know, actually, I was thinking you and Johnny should spend some time together.
translation.zh: 其实我在想你和约翰尼 应该过二人世界

translation.en: What do you call it again? Eh, date night?
translation.zh: 你叫它什么了？“约会之夜”？

translation.en: Date night?
translation.zh: -约会晚？ -那你要做什么？

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -Well, I thought
translation.zh: -约会晚？ -那你要做什么？ 我在想我和朋友拿这个机会

translation.en: me and the guys would take this opportunity
translation.zh: 我在想我和朋友拿这个机会

translation.en: to spend some quality time with Dennis.
translation.zh: 跟丹尼斯度过一些时光

translation.en: Oh. Okay. That's a great idea. Come on, Johnny. Date night.
translation.zh: 噢！好 那是好主意 来 约翰尼！ 约会之夜

translation.en: Duh-duh-duh-duh-date night!
translation.zh: 约会之夜！

translation.en: -Okay, here you go! -[panting]
translation.zh: 好 开始了！

translation.en: -Good girl! -I got this one.
translation.zh: -乖女孩！ -这次论到我！

translation.en: What was that? -[rumbling] -It sounds like our children.
translation.zh: -那是什么？ -听起来像我们的孩子

translation.en: -It is our children! Run! -Run!
translation.zh: 是我们的孩子！ 跑！

translation.en: Please! Help! Someone! Get the parents!
translation.zh: 请帮忙！叫人找他们的父母！

translation.en: Frank? Would you rub some moonscreen on my back before I get burned?
translation.zh: 弗兰克 可以帮我涂一些 防月光油在背部吗？免得我被晒伤

translation.en: Wait one second, honey. You know, the kids buried me in the sand.
translation.zh: 等一等 亲爱的 孩子们把我埋在沙里

translation.en: Mmm. Thanks, honey.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 亲爱的

translation.en: Isn't this place amazing?
translation.zh: 这里是不是很棒？

translation.en: Whoa! The menu is in a bottle!
translation.zh: 哇！菜单在酒瓶里 天才！

translation.en: Genius! Isn't that awesome, honey?
translation.zh: 哇！菜单在酒瓶里 天才！ 那不是很棒吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: What? Oh, sorry. I was just thinking about my dad.
translation.zh: 什么？对不起 我在想我的爸爸

translation.en: Don't you think he's acting weird lately?
translation.zh: 你不觉得他最近很奇怪吗？

translation.en: Not really. Besides having a huge crush on the captain.
translation.zh: 可不是 除了对船长动了真情

translation.en: -What! -[chuckles] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -什么？ -是的

translation.en: The Love Boat is definitely making another run.
translation.zh: 爱之船肯定再次启航

translation.en: No way. He's...
translation.zh: 不可能 他…

translation.en: He's my dad.
translation.zh: 他是我爸爸

translation.en: I know, right? It's weird.
translation.zh: 我知道 对吗？这很奇怪

translation.en: When my parents kiss, I still close my eyes.
translation.zh: 当我父母接吻 我还闭上眼睛

translation.en: I guess I never thought about him with anyone besides my mom.
translation.zh: 我想我从没想过他和另一个人在一起 除了我妈

translation.en: You're cool with it, though, right?
translation.zh: 然而你会接受 对吗？

translation.en: Of course. I... I want him to be happy.
translation.zh: 当然！我要他开心

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 绝对同意

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 绝对同意

translation.en: Buenas noches, mi amigo.
translation.zh: 晚上好 朋友

translation.en: Have you a beverage to quench me of my parchment?
translation.zh: 你有没有饮料 帮我解渴？

translation.en: Yes, of course, Mr. Chupacabra.
translation.zh: 当然有 卓柏卡布拉先生

translation.en: Muchas gracias. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You look ravishing.
translation.zh: 你看起来很漂亮

translation.en: Oh! Uh, thank you. I just...
translation.zh: 哦！谢谢 我只是…

translation.en: So, um...
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: Does Captain Ericka have a last name?
translation.zh: 艾丽卡船长姓什么？

translation.en: Oh, guacamole!
translation.zh: 鳄梨！

translation.en: "Ericka Guacamole"? That's so international.
translation.zh: “艾丽卡鳄梨”？真国际

translation.en: [chuckles] No. Guacamole for us to share.
translation.zh: 不！鳄梨是我们共享的

translation.en: Oh, how beautiful is that full moon tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚的满月是不是很漂亮？

translation.en: Look. Right behind you.
translation.zh: 看！就在你背后

translation.en: Mmm! The food here is to die for.
translation.zh: 这里的食物太美味了

translation.en: Holy moly, that was a lot of guacamole.
translation.zh: 天啊 那是好多的鳄梨

translation.en: Are you feeling all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -Totally fine. Why? -No reason.
translation.zh: 绝对没事 为什么？ 没理由

translation.en: Oh... There must have been garlic in the guacamole.
translation.zh: 鳄梨里面一定有蒜头

translation.en: -Oh, no. -[groans] Isn't that deadly for you?
translation.zh: 糟了 那不是要了你的命吗？

translation.en: No, no, no. It's just that I'm... Garlic intolerant.
translation.zh: 不 我只是不能忍受蒜头

translation.en: Was that you?
translation.zh: 是你吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Dolphin surfing!
translation.zh: 好！海豚冲浪！

translation.en: -Hi, Mama. Hi, Papa. -Hey-hey.
translation.zh: -嗨妈妈！嗨爸爸！ -嘿！

translation.en: -Oh! Hey there. -[blubbers]
translation.zh: 哦！嗨！

translation.en: -Papa. -Hidey-ho!
translation.zh: -爸爸 -我在这里！

translation.en: -Hi. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 嗨！

translation.en: -Is my dad in there, too? -[monsters gasp]
translation.zh: 我爸也在里面吗？

translation.en: [Griffin as Dracula] Don't worry, I'm over here. Bleh, bleh-bleh.
translation.zh: 别担心 我在这里 巴拉巴拉巴拉

translation.en: [giggles] No, Papa Drac's not here. He's on his date.
translation.zh: 不 德古拉爷爷不在这里 他去约会

translation.en: Date?
translation.zh: “约会”？

translation.en: Please, forgive me. I...
translation.zh: 请原谅我 我非常紧张

translation.en: I'm just very nervous. You see,
translation.zh: 请原谅我 我非常紧张 你看 我很久没去约会

translation.en: I haven't had a date since my wife died.
translation.zh: 你看 我很久没去约会 自从我的太太去世后

translation.en: How old was your daughter?
translation.zh: 你女儿当时多大？

translation.en: She was just an infant.
translation.zh: 她还是宝宝

translation.en: It was hard being a single dad, but I... I did my best.
translation.zh: 当一个单亲爸爸很辛苦 但是我尽力而为

translation.en: I never knew my mother, either. Or my father.
translation.zh: 我也没见过我的妈妈或爸爸

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry. Who raised you?
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 谁养大你？

translation.en: My great-grandfather.
translation.zh: 我的曾祖父

translation.en: I basically grew up on this ship.
translation.zh: 我基本上在这艘船上长大

translation.en: That's why you're a captain.
translation.zh: 所以你是个船长

translation.en: Yeah. It's all I've ever known.
translation.zh: 我只懂得这些

translation.en: It was just expected. You know, a family thing.
translation.zh: 这都是预料中的事 家族传承

translation.en: I understand, family is everything.
translation.zh: 我明白 家庭就是一切

translation.en: You have to honor the past.
translation.zh: 你不能忘记过去

translation.en: But we make our own future.
translation.zh: 但是未来由我们来创造

translation.en: -[Mavis] Dad? -Mavis!
translation.zh: -爸？ -梅维丝！

translation.en: -[Jonathan munches] Mmm. -Johnny!
translation.zh: 约翰尼！

translation.en: Captain Ericka and I were just discussing the hospitality industry.
translation.zh: 艾丽卡船长和我在讨论酒店业

translation.en: You know, just work stuff.
translation.zh: 只是公事！

translation.en: You're working now?
translation.zh: 你现在在工作？

translation.en: This is supposed to be a vacation. A family vacation.
translation.zh: 这应该是假期 家庭假期

translation.en: I should really go do captain-y things.
translation.zh: 我应该去做船长的事

translation.en: Dad, you said you were gonna spend time with Dennis.
translation.zh: 爸 你说过你要和丹尼斯 度过一些时光

translation.en: Dennis. Dennis? Dennis. Dennis.
translation.zh: 丹尼斯…

translation.en: Oh! Yeah, you're right. Where is that kid?
translation.zh: 噢！你说得对！那孩子在哪里？

translation.en: Denisovich? You're supposed to be with me.
translation.zh: 丹尼索维克！你应该和我一起

translation.en: Come on now, kid, it's family time. Quit hiding. Dennis?
translation.zh: 快出来 孩子 家庭时间 别躲了 丹尼斯！

translation.en: What was that about? You mean your dad's date?
translation.zh: -那是怎么回事？ -你是说你爸爸的约会？

translation.en: It wasn't a date. It was work stuff.
translation.zh: -那不是约会！那是公事！ -是的

translation.en: Uh-huh.
translation.zh: -那不是约会！那是公事！ -是的 我告诉你 约翰尼 我不相信这女人

translation.en: I'm telling you, Johnny, there is something about that woman I don't trust.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 约翰尼 我不相信这女人

translation.en: But you want your dad to be happy, right?
translation.zh: 但是你要你爸开心 对吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Just not with her.
translation.zh: 只是不是她

translation.en: Heads up, honey. This guac is loaded with garlic.
translation.zh: 小心 亲爱的 这鳄梨加了很多蒜头

translation.en: Garlic?
translation.zh: 蒜头？

translation.en: Aw! That was a cute toot, honey.
translation.zh: 噢！那是一个很可爱的放屁声 亲爱的！

translation.en: -We've been up all night! -Let's stay up all day, too!
translation.zh: -我们整晚没睡！ -让我们也整天不睡！

translation.en: -Let's get wild! -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我们来疯狂吧！

translation.en: -Ericka! -[shrieks] What?
translation.zh: -艾丽卡！ -什么？

translation.en: -[sighs in relief] -Just where have you been, young lady?
translation.zh: 你去了哪里 小姐？

translation.en: Uh, doing work.
translation.zh: 工作

translation.en: Wearing that?
translation.zh: 穿那个？

translation.en: You were with him! I know it!
translation.zh: 你和他一起！我就知道！

translation.en: Who? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: "Who?" You know who!
translation.zh: “谁”？你知道是谁！

translation.en: You've been sneaking around my back
translation.zh: 你又偷偷背着我

translation.en: trying to kill Dracula again, haven't you?
translation.zh: 又想尝试杀德古拉 对吗？

translation.en: So what if I have? I am a grown woman!
translation.zh: 如果我是呢？我是一个成年女人！

translation.en: I have the right to kill whoever I want.
translation.zh: 我有权利杀我想杀的人

translation.en: It's not just about you.
translation.zh: 这不只是你的事

translation.en: You could have ruined the legacy.
translation.zh: 你可能会毁了传承！

translation.en: What if he discovered who you were?
translation.zh: 如果他发现你的真面目呢？

translation.en: I know. I wasn't thinking. There's just...
translation.zh: 我知道了 我没想清楚

translation.en: There's just something about him that just drives me crazy!
translation.zh: 他有一些东西令我疯狂！

translation.en: -I just, I see him, and I want to... -Punch him?
translation.zh: 我看到他 我就想… 打他？

translation.en: Uh... I guess.
translation.zh: 我猜是

translation.en: Just, I can't wait to get this over with.
translation.zh: 我很心急要结束这件事！

translation.en: Don't worry, it won't be long now.
translation.zh: 别担心 不会很久

translation.en: Once you recover the instrument of destruction,
translation.zh: 一旦你找到毁灭的工具

translation.en: no one can stop us.
translation.zh: 没有人可以阻止我们

translation.en: Not even Dracula!
translation.zh: 连德古拉也不行！

translation.en: -Oh. Excuse me. -Spies!
translation.zh: -对不起 -间谍！

translation.en: Now, quickly, before someone comes!
translation.zh: 趁没人来之前 快走！

translation.en: [Fish Man over PA] Everyone assemble on the forward deck.
translation.zh: 所有人聚集在前方甲板

translation.en: We are arriving at our final destination.
translation.zh: 我们即将抵达我们最后目的地

translation.en: From the depths of creation,
translation.zh: 来自深度的创造 强大的城市再次崛起

translation.en: the mighty city has risen once again.
translation.zh: 来自深度的创造 强大的城市再次崛起 拥有世界上最伟大的妖怪文明

translation.en: Home to the greatest monster civilization
translation.zh: 拥有世界上最伟大的妖怪文明

translation.en: the world has ever known,
translation.zh: 拥有世界上最伟大的妖怪文明 远超雅典和罗马的艺术 文化和精致度

translation.en: far surpassing Athens and Rome
translation.zh: 远超雅典和罗马的艺术 文化和精致度

translation.en: in art, culture and sophistication.
translation.zh: 远超雅典和罗马的艺术 文化和精致度 我介绍你们传奇的失落城市

translation.en: I give you the legendary lost city of Atlantis.
translation.zh: 我介绍你们传奇的失落城市 阿特兰蒂斯

translation.en: [yells] It's a giant Kraken!
translation.zh: 那是一只巨大海怪！

translation.en: Welcome to Atlantis!
translation.zh: 欢迎光临阿特兰蒂斯！

translation.en: Ooh. I am so excited! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我很兴奋！ 过来我这里！

translation.en: [monster] Come to Daddy!
translation.zh: 过来我这里！

translation.en: -Oh. -[Fish Man] Twenty-eight black!
-[screams] -Oh, no, you don't.
translation.zh: 你不可以赌

translation.en: Last time you gambled, you lost an arm and a leg. Literally!
translation.zh: 你上次赌博输了一条手臂和腿！

translation.en: -Replacement limbs... -[monster] I'll raise you 40. ...aren't just lying around like they were in the old days.
translation.zh: 替换的肢体不像以前那样到处都是

translation.en: So, no gambling.
translation.zh: 所以不准赌博！ 弗兰克！

translation.en: -Frank! -Yes, dear! Got it! No gambling!
translation.zh: 是的 亲爱的 明白了 不赌博

translation.en: -[Dennis] Tinkles, stop. -[Winnie] Wait.
translation.zh: -丁格斯 停！ -等一等！ 停 丁格斯！

translation.en: -Stop it, Tinkles, stop. -Ah! Wait!
translation.zh: 停 丁格斯！

translation.en: Have you guys seen Mavis? I have to find her.
translation.zh: 你看到梅维丝吗？我要找她 -为什么 发生什么事？ -我要告诉她关于艾丽卡的事

translation.en: Why? What's going on? I'm going to tell her about Ericka.
translation.zh: -为什么 发生什么事？ -我要告诉她关于艾丽卡的事

translation.en: I can't lie to my own daughter anymore.
translation.zh: 我不能再对我的孩子撒谎了 在我的世界里她是我最重要的人

translation.en: She's the most important person in the world to me.
translation.zh: 在我的世界里她是我最重要的人

translation.en: I have to tell her the truth.
translation.zh: 我要告诉她真相

translation.en: Right after I talk to Ericka.
translation.zh: 在我跟艾丽卡谈话之后

translation.en: [snickers] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: All right, I'm all--
translation.zh: 好的 我要押… 弗兰克 你知道你在做什么？

translation.en: Frank, are you sure you know what you're doing?
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你知道你在做什么？

translation.en: I got this. I'm all in.
translation.zh: 我知道 我要押全部

translation.en: Johnny, have you seen my dad?
translation.zh: -约翰尼 你见过我爸吗？ -可能他和鲍勃在一起

translation.en: -Maybe he's with Bob. -Why would he be with Bob?
translation.zh: -为什么他会和鲍勃在一起 -鲍勃是个好人

translation.en: Bob's a great guy.
translation.zh: -为什么他会和鲍勃在一起 -鲍勃是个好人 -他在这里 -谁？鲍勃？

translation.en: -Oh, there he is. -Who? Bob?
translation.zh: -他在这里 -谁？鲍勃？

translation.en: There he is! Hi, Bob! [laughing]
translation.zh: 他在那里！嗨 鲍勃！

translation.en: There it is.
translation.zh: 它在那里

translation.en: You saved my life.
translation.zh: -你救了我的命 -当然 我为什么不救呢？

translation.en: Of course. Why wouldn't I?
translation.zh: -你救了我的命 -当然 我为什么不救呢？ 我无法相信你会为人类这样做

translation.en: I just can't believe you would do that for a human.
translation.zh: 我无法相信你会为人类这样做 人类 怪物 有什么不同？

translation.en: Humans, monsters, what's the difference?
translation.zh: 人类 怪物 有什么不同？

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] Yeah, right. Right.
translation.zh: 是 对的

translation.en: Wait. What... Uh, What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 等 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Oh, uh, well, you know, vampires can predict the future,
translation.zh: 那么你知道吸血鬼可以预测未来 所以我知道你需要帮忙

translation.en: so I knew you would need my help.
translation.zh: 所以我知道你需要帮忙

translation.en: Ha! Never heard that before.
translation.zh: 我从来没有听过这种事

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. It's a well-known fact.
translation.zh: 这是一个众所周知的事实

translation.en: [stammers] What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你在这里做什么？ 我来拿这东西

translation.en: Oh! Uh... Well, um, I'm here to get that.
translation.zh: 我来拿这东西

translation.en: Yeah, it's a family heirloom.
translation.zh: 是的 这是一个家传之宝

translation.en: Yeah, it was lost at sea,
translation.zh: 它在海上遗失了 而我的曾祖父

translation.en: and, um, my great-grandfather is-- Was!
translation.zh: 它在海上遗失了 而我的曾祖父 一心要找回它

translation.en: Was... Uh, totally obsessed with getting it back.
translation.zh: 一心要找回它 无论如何 谢谢你救了我

translation.en: So, anywho, thanks for saving my life, but I can take it from...
translation.zh: 无论如何 谢谢你救了我 但我可以搞定

translation.en: Got to be a little more careful.
translation.zh: 你一定要小心 你能救我多少次 对吗？

translation.en: How many times can you save my life, right?
translation.zh: 你能救我多少次 对吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Every time? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我不知道 每一次？ 真的吗？如果这样

translation.en: Really? Well, then...
translation.zh: 真的吗？如果这样

translation.en: Wow!
translation.zh: 哇！

translation.en: [sighs] Ah, that was incredible.
translation.zh: 这太神奇了！

translation.en: Oh, uh... Don't you want to get your family heirloom thingy?
translation.zh: 你不是要去拿你的家传之宝吗？

translation.en: Oh. Right.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: [chuckles] Got it.
translation.zh: 拿到了！

translation.en: -Mmm. -[chuckling] Oh, here, let me get that for you.
translation.zh: 来 让我来帮你

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: Mavis!
translation.zh: 梅维丝

translation.en: What are you doing to my father?
translation.zh: 你对我爸爸做什么？

translation.en: Mavis, stop! Put her down!
translation.zh: 梅维丝 停止！ 把她放下！ 不 她想伤害你！你还看不到吗？

translation.en: No! She's trying to hurt you. Why can't you see that?
translation.zh: 不 她想伤害你！你还看不到吗？

translation.en: Because I...
translation.zh: 因为爸爸…因为…

translation.en: Because... Because I Zinged.
translation.zh: 因为爸爸动了心

translation.en: -[Ericka grunts] -What? I Zinged with Ericka.
translation.zh: -什么？ -我爱上艾丽卡

translation.en: No, that can't be true.
translation.zh: 不 不可能

translation.en: You only Zing once.
translation.zh: 你只能动一次心

translation.en: That's what I thought, too.
translation.zh: 我也这么想过

translation.en: "Zing"? What's a Zing?
translation.zh: “心”？那是什么东西？

translation.en: Uh, well, it's a thing for monsters.
translation.zh: 那是怪物的词语 这有点像我们一见钟情

translation.en: It's kind of like our "love at first sight."
translation.zh: 这有点像我们一见钟情 什么？不

translation.en: What? No. No, no, no.
translation.zh: 什么？不 不 你还不了解我

translation.en: -You don't even know me. -Well, not yet.
translation.zh: 还没有 但是我们刚才…

translation.en: -But we're just-- -No, you don't understand. I can't be with you.
translation.zh: 不 你不明白 我不能和你在一起

translation.en: I could never be with someone like you.
translation.zh: 我永远不能和你这样的人在一起 我永远不能和

translation.en: I could never be with
translation.zh: 我永远不能和

translation.en: a monster.
translation.zh: 妖怪在一起！

translation.en: Dad, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我很抱歉

translation.en: -I-- -It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: You heard what she said.
translation.zh: 你听到她说的话

translation.en: But a Zing never lies.
translation.zh: 但是心动的感觉骗不了人

translation.en: Ha! You got it! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你拿到了！

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Now that we have the instrument of destruction,
translation.zh: 现在我们有了毁灭武器 我们家的传统将会实现！

translation.en: our family legacy will be fulfilled.
translation.zh: 我们家的传统将会实现！ 但首先 我们会吸引他们去一个舞会！

translation.en: But first, we'll draw them in with a dance party!
translation.zh: 但首先 我们会吸引他们去一个舞会！ 我喜欢跳舞！

translation.en: I love to dance.
translation.zh: 我喜欢跳舞！

translation.en: [Eunice] Frank, could you zip me up?
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你能帮拉我链吗？ 我们要迟到了

translation.en: We're gonna be late. [gasps]
translation.zh: 弗兰克 你能帮拉我链吗？ 我们要迟到了 你从哪里获得的？

translation.en: Where did you get those?
translation.zh: 你从哪里获得的？

translation.en: Uh, see, [stammers] here's the funny thing.
translation.zh: 这就是有趣的地方

translation.en: I lost my hands gambling, but... It's no big deal!
translation.zh: 我的手赌钱输掉了 但是没关系

translation.en: Look, I got these from the seafood buffet.
translation.zh: 我从海鲜自助餐获得的 看

translation.en: I kind of like 'em. I like 'em.
translation.zh: 我蛮喜欢它们 我喜欢它们

translation.en: Ah, I guess the party's this way.
translation.zh: 啊 我猜派对是这边

translation.en: Let's get this party started right!
translation.zh: 让派对开始吧！

translation.en: I thought they said the party was this way.
translation.zh: 我以为他们说派对是这一边

translation.en: DJ in a clamshell?
translation.zh: 在蚌壳里的唱片骑士？

translation.en: [gasps] I'm so jealous.
translation.zh: 我很妒忌

translation.en: I can't believe my dad Zinged with someone who's trying to kill him.
translation.zh: 我无法相信我爸喜欢一个想杀他的人

translation.en: Yeah, the Zing makes you do crazy things.
translation.zh: 是的 爱情令你做疯狂的事

translation.en: Really, Johnny?
translation.zh: 真的吗 约翰尼？ 你要明白的重点是

translation.en: What's most important to understand is that love is an infinite enigma
translation.zh: 你要明白的重点是 爱是无尽的谜

translation.en: that is beyond our understanding.
translation.zh: 超越我们所能明白的

translation.en: You and I were two halves, a world apart.
translation.zh: 你和我是两半 分隔两地 但是我们追随命运的线索

translation.en: But then we followed the strands of destiny
translation.zh: 但是我们追随命运的线索

translation.en: and were brought together.
translation.zh: 让我们最终在一起 我们的一半终于完整了

translation.en: And our halves made one whole.
translation.zh: 我们的一半终于完整了

translation.en: But what if she and he--
translation.zh: 但是如果她和他 你必须释放所有负能量和听你的心声

translation.en: You must release all the negativity and look within.
translation.zh: 你必须释放所有负能量和听你的心声

translation.en: Your bond is unbreakable.
translation.zh: 你的关系是不可断裂的

translation.en: You're right, honey. Wow. Thanks.
translation.zh: 你说得对 亲爱的 哇 谢谢 哇 你听起来很聪明 爸

translation.en: Whoa, you sounded pretty smart, Dad.
translation.zh: 哇 你听起来很聪明 爸 噢 那个吗？是的那是兴师傅的哲理

translation.en: Oh, that? Yeah, it was just the philosophy
translation.zh: 噢 那个吗？是的那是兴师傅的哲理

translation.en: of Sifu Sing from my favorite TV show when I was a kid,
translation.zh: 来自我小时候最喜欢的电视节目 少林功夫大师

translation.en: Kung Fu Shaolin Monk Master.
translation.zh: 来自我小时候最喜欢的电视节目 少林功夫大师 -无论如何 我们继续跳舞吧！ -好

translation.en: Anyways, let's get back to dancing! Cool.
translation.zh: -无论如何 我们继续跳舞吧！ -好

translation.en: Dad? You have to talk to Ericka.
translation.zh: 爸 你必须和艾丽卡谈谈 什么？

translation.en: -What? -I know.
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I know what I said before,
translation.zh: 我知道我之前说过什么 但是我可能有点激动

translation.en: but maybe I overreacted a teensy bit.
translation.zh: 我知道我之前说过什么 但是我可能有点激动 可能是因为想到会失去你

translation.en: It's just the thought of losing you.
translation.zh: 可能是因为想到会失去你

translation.en: What? What are you talking about? Losing me?
translation.zh: 什么？你说什么 “失去我”？

translation.en: Well, obviously, after you get married,
translation.zh: 很明显你在结婚后将住在船上

translation.en: you're gonna live on the ship and travel around the world--
translation.zh: 很明显你在结婚后将住在船上 和环游世界

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Slow down, Mavis.
translation.zh: 慢点 梅维丝 有两件事我可以向你保证

translation.en: There are two things I can promise you.
translation.zh: 有两件事我可以向你保证

translation.en: One, nothing can ever take me from you and all my family.
translation.zh: 第一 没什么可以 把你我和我们一家分开 第二 我绝不会住在船上

translation.en: Two, I will never live on a boat.
translation.zh: 第二 我绝不会住在船上

translation.en: You're my cute little tarantula. How could I ever leave you?
translation.zh: 你是我可爱的心肝宝贝 我怎舍得离开你？

translation.en: Now, seriously, go talk to her.
translation.zh: 现在认真的 去找她谈

translation.en: I can't. You heard what she said.
translation.zh: 我不能 你听到她说什么了 她绝不会和像我这种人在一起

translation.en: She could never be with someone like me.
translation.zh: 她绝不会和像我这种人在一起 不 爸 你只是另一半

translation.en: No, Dad. You're just a half,
translation.zh: 不 爸 你只是另一半 你必须听从你的命运寻找完整

translation.en: and you have to follow your destiny to find an infinite whole.
translation.zh: 你必须听从你的命运寻找完整 你听起来像约翰尼

translation.en: You sound like Johnny.
translation.zh: 你听起来像约翰尼

translation.en: Point is, you can't deny a Zing.
translation.zh: 重点是你不能拒绝真情

translation.en: Monster, human, unicorn... It doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 妖怪 人类或独角兽都不重要

translation.en: So go to her! Now!
translation.zh: 所以快去找她 现在就去！

translation.en: Okay. I'm on it.
translation.zh: 好 我这就去

translation.en: [DJ] Hey, man, you're not allowed up here.
translation.zh: 朋友 你不能上来这里 唱片骑士亭是神圣的地方！

translation.en: The DJ booth is a sacred space. [screams]
translation.zh: 唱片骑士亭是神圣的地方！

translation.en: No, no. Tinkles, quiet, quiet.
translation.zh: 不 丁格斯 安静！

translation.en: Who is this?
translation.zh: 这是谁？

translation.en: Ha! I know you recognize me, your greatest rival.
translation.zh: 我知道你认得我 你的最大敌人

translation.en: Hmm. Oh, right.
translation.zh: 噢 对了

translation.en: You own that Holiday Inn down by the airport.
translation.zh: 你是机场附近的假日酒店的老板

translation.en: No! It is I, Abraham Van Helsing.
translation.zh: 不 是我… 阿布拉罕范海辛

translation.en: Van Helsing? After all these years?
translation.zh: 范海辛？经过了这么多年

translation.en: You look awful.
translation.zh: 你看起来很糟糕

translation.en: Always with the quick insults.
translation.zh: 还是那么爱损人

translation.en: Well, this will shut you up.
translation.zh: 这能令你闭嘴！ 还有所有妖怪！

translation.en: And all monsters.
translation.zh: 还有所有妖怪！

translation.en: Eh, huh? That's just Ericka's family heirloom thingy.
translation.zh: 那只是艾丽卡家族的遗物

translation.en: [chuckles evilly] Good one, Ericka.
translation.zh: 做得好 艾丽卡

translation.en: Ericka?
translation.zh: 艾丽卡？

translation.en: You fool.
translation.zh: 你这笨蛋 她不只是船长

translation.en: Not only is she the ship's captain, but she also happens to be...
translation.zh: 你这笨蛋 她不只是船长 她还是…

translation.en: Wait. You tell him.
translation.zh: 等一等 你告诉他

translation.en: I'm his great-granddaughter.
translation.zh: 我是他的曾孙女

translation.en: I'm Ericka Van Helsing.
translation.zh: 我是艾丽卡范海辛

translation.en: [gasps] I knew there was something wrong with her.
translation.zh: 我就知道她不妥

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 但是… 我…听好 所发生的事…我…

translation.en: [stammers] I... See, what happened... I...
translation.zh: 我…听好 所发生的事…我… 现在我们都清楚了 我们回到死亡那部分

translation.en: Now that we're all caught up, let's get back to the dying.
translation.zh: 现在我们都清楚了 我们回到死亡那部分

translation.en: Behold, the key to the demise of all monsters.
translation.zh: 看吧 消灭所有妖怪的关键东西！

translation.en: Let's see. Right... Okay.
translation.zh: 让我们看看 对了 好

translation.en: Listen to the melody of your destruction.
translation.zh: 听你们毁灭的旋律

translation.en: Ooh, what's this little doodad do?
translation.zh: 噢 这些小东西做什么的？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: Hey, look! It's the Kraken.
translation.zh: 嘿 看！是海…怪

translation.en: Everybody out! Now!
translation.zh: 所有人马上出去！

translation.en: We're trapped! Everybody back!
translation.zh: 我们被困住了！大家退回去！

translation.en: -[Tinkles growling] -[both] Yay!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: This has to stop now!
translation.zh: 这必须马上停止

translation.en: Drac, no!
translation.zh: 德古拉 不！

translation.en: Dad! [grunts]
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: Mavis!
translation.zh: 梅维！

translation.en: Time for the immortal Dracula to die.
translation.zh: 不死德古拉的死期到了

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Ericka!
translation.zh: 艾丽卡！

translation.en: -Bob! Help! -Huh?
translation.zh: 鲍勃 救命！

translation.en: Tinkles? Dennis.
translation.zh: 丁格斯？丹尼斯！

translation.en: Oh, no. Bob is Tinkles? How did he get here?
translation.zh: 天啊 鲍勃是丁格斯？ 他是如何来这里？

translation.en: But thank goodness he did, 'cause look!
translation.zh: 但是幸好他来了 因为你看！

translation.en: You can't do this! You're wrong about monsters!
translation.zh: 你不能这样做！你误会了妖怪！

translation.en: Dracula. He saved my life.
translation.zh: 德古拉 他救了我的命 什么？

translation.en: -What? -I'm so sorry, Drac.
translation.zh: 对不起 德古拉

translation.en: I was trying to kill you this whole time,
translation.zh: 我一直想杀你

translation.en: but then I realized how wrong I was.
translation.zh: 然后我意识到我错了

translation.en: How wrong all of this is.
translation.zh: 这一切是那么的错

translation.en: And then I...
translation.zh: 然后我…

translation.en: I Zinged.
translation.zh: 我动了心

translation.en: "Zing"? What's a Zing?
translation.zh: “心”？那是什么东西？

translation.en: It's a monster thing. You wouldn't understand.
translation.zh: 这是妖怪的东西 你不会明白

translation.en: It's like true love.
translation.zh: 这犹如真爱

translation.en: Love?
translation.zh: 爱？

translation.en: Well, I guess the legacy ends with me.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想传承在我这一代终结

translation.en: Hmm, that's an awkward ending. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那是一个尴尬的结局 不！

translation.en: [Ericka] Nope!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: It's time to start a new legacy.
translation.zh: 是时刻开始新的传承

translation.en: A monster-human legacy.
translation.zh: 一个妖怪人类传承

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Drac! Van Helsing's beats are controlling the giant octopus thingy.
translation.zh: 德古拉！ 范海辛的旋律控制那大八爪鱼

translation.en: If there's one thing I hate, it's an evil DJ.
translation.zh: 如果有一件事是我讨厌的 那就是邪恶唱片骑士

translation.en: We need positive energy!
translation.zh: 我们需要正能量

translation.en: Get ready for a DJ battle!
translation.zh: 准备唱片骑士战斗

translation.en: You just carry all that stuff around with you?
translation.zh: 你随身带着这些东西？

translation.en: Once a bar mitzvah DJ, always a bar mitzvah DJ.
translation.zh: 一旦成为唱片骑士 终身是唱片骑士

translation.en: We're gonna use good music to defeat his evil music.
translation.zh: 我们要用好音乐来打败他的邪恶音乐

translation.en: -What? -Trust me, I know the tunes,
translation.zh: -什么？ -相信我 我懂得歌曲 但是你有力量

translation.en: but you've got the power.
translation.zh: 我懂得歌曲 但是你有力量

translation.en: All right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Opening song needs to be off the shizak.
translation.zh: 开场曲必须稳重

translation.en: Ooh, got it. Play this! [giggles]
translation.zh: 噢！找到了 播放这个！

translation.en: What is that noise?
translation.zh: 什么声音？

translation.en: ♪ She's giving me excitations♪ Whoa! I like this one. This feels good.
translation.zh: 哇 我喜欢这首 这感觉很好

translation.en: [laughing] The fool.
translation.zh: 那笨蛋

translation.en: Whoa! His music is too powerful!
translation.zh: 哇！他的音乐太强大了！ 我们需要一些更正能量的音乐

translation.en: We're gonna need something even more positive.
translation.zh: 我们需要一些更正能量的音乐

translation.en: Now, Drac!
translation.zh: 现在 德古拉！

translation.en: -Really? -It has a nice message.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 它有一条很好的信息

translation.en: I've had enough of this nonsense!
translation.zh: 我听够这些废话了！

translation.en: Johnny, we need the most brain-dominating,
translation.zh: 约翰尼 我们需要全宇宙史上

translation.en: toe-tappinating song in the history of all the universe.
translation.zh: 最洗脑最亢奋的歌曲

translation.en: [Jonathan] Come on. Where is it?
translation.zh: 拜托 在哪里？

translation.en: I don't know!
translation.zh: 我不知道！

translation.en: There's too many choices.
translation.zh: 太多选择了！

translation.en: No, wait!
translation.zh: 不 等一等

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 就 是 它

translation.en: What the...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: Boy, that stinks.
translation.zh: 天啊 真厉害

translation.en: It's working!
translation.zh: 成功了！

translation.en: Hey, Johnny's corny music is defeating the evil music.
translation.zh: 嘿 约翰尼的古怪音乐 打败了邪恶音乐

translation.en: I kind of like it.
translation.zh: 我蛮喜欢的

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Argh! Ahh! Whoo! I'm a slave to the rhythm!
translation.zh: 我成了旋律的奴隶

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Drac, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 德古拉 你做什么？

translation.en: You got to be greater than the haters!
translation.zh: 你必须以德报怨

translation.en: Why? Why, after everything,
translation.zh: 为什么？经过了一切

translation.en: would you save my life?
translation.zh: 为何要救我？

translation.en: Because basically we are all the same.
translation.zh: 因为基本上我们都是一样

translation.en: Claws or hands, two eyes or three eyes.
translation.zh: 爪子或手 两眼或三眼

translation.en: -Green skin. -No skin.
translation.zh: -绿皮肤 -没皮肤

translation.en: -Prickly. -Brainy.
translation.zh: -有刺 -聪明

translation.en: [stammers] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: You are amazing.
translation.zh: 你太棒了

translation.en: Look at me, Dennis. Look at me.
translation.zh: 看着我 丹尼斯 看着我

translation.en: Come on, you can't deny it.
translation.zh: 来吧 你不能拒绝它

translation.en: No! I'm too young to Zing!
translation.zh: 不！我太小 不能谈恋爱！

translation.en: Well, I feel kind of silly now.
translation.zh: 现在我觉得很愚蠢

translation.en: Heh. For decades, I have hunted your kind, persecuted you.
translation.zh: 几十年来我一直在追捕你们 迫害你们

translation.en: The only thing I can do to make it up to you is
translation.zh: 我唯一能补偿你们的是

translation.en: give you
translation.zh: 给你们

translation.en: [stammers] a 30% refund.
translation.zh: 30%回扣

translation.en: -[angry chatter] -Preposterous!
translation.zh: 30%回扣 荒谬

translation.en: Oh, all right. Full refund.
translation.zh: 好吧 全额退款

translation.en: [Griffin] Wayne, Wanda, what happened to you guys?
translation.zh: 维恩 万达 你们怎么了？

translation.en: [Crystal] Yeah, we, like, hardly saw you on the cruise.
translation.zh: 对 我们在游轮很少见到你们

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 是 我知道 我们被迷昏并大部分时间被锁在橱里

translation.en: We got tranquilized and spent most of the trip locked in a closet.
translation.zh: 我们被迷昏并大部分时间被锁在橱里

translation.en: [sighs] We're gonna book it again for the holidays.
translation.zh: 我们会再订假期

translation.en: Hi. Checking in? Yes. Thank you.
translation.zh: -嗨 登记吗？ -是的 谢谢

translation.en: -Great. I have a room all ready for you. -[Ericka and Dracula giggling]
translation.zh: 很好 我有一间房给你准备好了

translation.en: Hey, buddy, would you mind?
translation.zh: 嘿 朋友 可以帮帮忙吗？

translation.en: -Sure thing, pal. -[Ericka laughs]
translation.zh: 没问题 朋友

translation.en: Okay, okay, what's going on, sneaky pants?
translation.zh: 好 发生什么事 鬼鬼祟祟的？

translation.en: Oh, nothing.
translation.zh: 噢 没什么 只是…

translation.en: It's just, I wanted to make sure nobody would bother us.
translation.zh: 我要确保没人会干扰我们

translation.en: Oh! Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: [imitates Dracula] Are you going to suck-a my blood? Bleh, bleh-bleh.
translation.zh: 你要吸我的血吗？巴拉巴拉巴拉

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: I was going to ask you
translation.zh: 我想问你是否

translation.en: if you would marry me.
translation.zh: 愿意嫁给我

translation.en: Well? What do you say? Will you marry me?
translation.zh: 怎样？你觉得怎样？ 你愿意嫁给我吗？

translation.en: Wha...
translation.zh: 什么…

translation.en: I mean, I... woobee doobeedee?
translation.zh: 我是说我乌比杜比第？

translation.en: [monsters] What did she say?
translation.zh: 她说什么？

translation.en: Uh... I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 我愿意！

translation.en: ♪ I see love around me ♪ ♪ From a river to a flood ♪
translation.zh: （剧终）
